title: IAppearanceSetting.SpecularColor
description: Gets or sets the color of reflected highlights for a specular component.
returns: Color of reflected highlights; valid only when IAppearanceSetting::SpecularSpread > 0 and IAppearanceSetting::Specular > 0 (see Remarks )
remarks:
specular_color
= MAX(MIN(
red_rgb_value
,255),0) + MAX(MIN(
green_rgb_value
,255),0)*16*16 + MAX(MIN(
blue_rgb_value
,255),0)*16*16*16*16
See SOLIDWORKS Help for more information about appearances.
